long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension is used in-conjunction with a phone service from Voxhub. It will identify telephone numbers on web pages and when the mouse cursor moves over those phone numbers it provides an interface to dial the phone number. It does this by ringing the users phone, then connecting them through to the phone number. You may select which of your devices should make the call whether that be one of the CallStation softphones or a physical desk phone.
